wordpressWpDailyReads.title: June 6 Social Security Reductions
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi there! We all know that thinking about our finances can be intimidating to say the least, but we at Sherman Wealth Management are here to help you improve your financial well-being. There’s so much information out there, so I wanted to share what I think are the most important reads of the day:

 

  1. Social Security must reduce benefits in 2034 if reforms aren’t made
  2. Buy in May and Stay Invested -The key to earning really large returns is investing long enough to experience the magic of compounding. Which is why a much more helpful saying than “Sell in May and Go Away” would be “Buy in May (and every other month) and Stay Invested
  3. Participants in defined contribution plans are relying more on professionally managed investment options, especially target-date funds, Vanguard Group reported Tuesday
